name: Meowgic 32bit Jam Edition
description:
Take a journey into CatLand, collect gems! Find special objects! Fight literally no enemies! CatLand awaits intrepid Hero, so what are you waiting for? See if you can collect everything! 

Just unpack the 7z file wherever you want, and run the Meowgic Quest .exe file to begin!

This prototype was made in 5 days (for roughly a total of 20 hours of real development time) for the 32bit game jam 2022 (https://itch.io/jam/32bit-jam-2022), so it may come with a few super extra features (bugs). Leave a comment or seven, especially if you find one of these features (bugs).  Meowgic the jam version has even been reviewed!:

“Collect  stuff..I guess? … Spyro but just worse. “ - Aura_Braixen4412

With praise like that, how can you resist? I promise Meowgic is only a mostly disappointing experience!
